TokenProfile.label: Token Profile
TokenProfile.randomize.label: Randomize
TokenProfile.profile.name: Profile: {name}
TokenProfile.profile.label: Profile:
TokenProfile.profile.create.title: New profile name
TokenProfile.visibility.label: Visible:
TokenProfile.confirmdelete: Are you sure you want to delete this?
TokenProfile.settings.players.edit.name: Players can edit profiles
TokenProfile.settings.players.edit.hint: Minimum player role to edit profiles on owned actors.
TokenProfile.settings.tooltip.players.se: Minimum player role to see profile tooltips on tokens (depending on vision, permissions, the profile's configuration etc.).
TokenProfile.settings.tooltip.position.h: Where to show the tooltip for a token.
TokenProfile.settings.tooltip.enabled.hi: If checked, profile tooltips are enabled on this client.
TokenProfile.settings.mod.gmnotes.toolti: If checked, includes notes from the GM Notes module in tooltips for GMs.
TokenProfile.settings.mod.perceptive.ena: If checked, profile tag requirements can be satisfied by Perceptive vision channels in addition to Tagger tags.
TokenProfile.settings.headerbutton.enabl: If checked, the module button is added to actor sheet title bars.
TokenProfile.settings.headerbutton.color: If checked, the button's color shows whether profiles are available and enabled.
TokenProfile.tutorial.profile: Create a new profile with the {button} button and switch to it via the profile dropdown to start editing.
TokenProfile.tutorial.paragraphs: To start adding content, add a paragraph to the profile {profile} using the {button} button.
TokenProfile.tt.profiles: Select the profile to view and edit.
TokenProfile.tt.add: Click to add a new profile.
TokenProfile.tt.copy: Click to copy content to a new profile.
TokenProfile.tt.rename: Click to rename the currently selected profile.
TokenProfile.tt.remove: Click to remove the currently selected profile.
TokenProfile.tt.random: If checked, the displayed profile will be randomized from those that are enabled and visible, depending on the viewer. The randomization depends on the token, so the same token always displays the same profile. This is useful to create pseudorandom profiles for e.g. unlinkend actors.
TokenProfile.tt.postp: Posts this profile to chat (respecting current roll mode). Some effort is made to respect visibility, but still: beware of spoilers!
TokenProfile.tt.ppost: Post this paragraph to chat (respecting current roll mode). Some effort is made to respect visibility, but still: beware of spoilers!
TokenProfile.tt.tags: Sender tags: comma separated list of Tagger tags this actor needs to show this paragraph to others. Requires Tagger. With Perceptive, vision channels can optionally also satisfy tag requirements.
TokenProfile.tt.tagr: Receiver tags: comma separated list of Tagger tags viewers need to see this paragraph. Requires Tagger. With Perceptive, vision channels can optionally also satisfy tag requirements.
TokenProfile.tt.vis: Minimum permissions needed to see this paragraph.
TokenProfile.tt.enabled: If checked, this profile is enabled and visible ingame (depending on vision, tags, permissions etc.). By default, the first visible profile is shown, unless randomize is enabled or a preferred profile is set in the data flags (e.g. via an Active Effect).
